title: Real-time Chat Application
description: A WhatsApp-inspired real-time messaging application with user authentication, instant messaging, and responsive design. Features include message history, user status, and seamless real-time communication.

title: Expense Tracker
description: A comprehensive expense tracking application that helps users monitor their spending habits. Features include expense categorization, budget management, visual charts, and financial insights to promote better money management.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative productivity application for team task management with real-time updates. Includes features like task assignment, progress tracking, deadline management, and team collaboration tools.
